"address"},{"indexed":true,"name":"tokenHolder","type":"address"}],"name":"RevokedOperator","type":"event"}],"devdoc":{"methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"sender can approve an amount to be withdrawn by spender"},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"balance for any owner"},"balanceOfByTranche(address,uint256)":{"details":"balance for any owner for specific tranche"},"canSend(uint256,address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"transfers of security might fail to multiple reasons (e.g. identity of sender and receiver, trading limits, meta state of token)relies on EIP1066 for Ethereum Standard Codes (ESC) and ERC770 for tranchingonly possible to read error code of 'doSend -> require' statement with assembly { call } for more elaborated error messages (see Ethereum documentation)","return":"ESC (byte), optional specific reason for failure (bytes32), (NOT IMPLEMENTED) destinantion tranche of the token beeing transfered (uint)"},"createToken(bytes32,bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"creates new token shell (status pending), safes information in storage","params":{"_granularity":"ensures, that granularity of shares is always a positive natural figure, cannot be changed ever"}},"decimals()":{"details":"number of decimals token uses, divide token amount by number of decimals to get user representation"},"delegate(address)":{"details":"possibility to delegate your vote to another voter"},"getAllAddressesEquityToken()":{"details":"getter for TotalDistribution array","return":"array with all addresses (owner)"},"getDefaultTranches(address)":{"details":"mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777 and ERC20"},"getInfosEquityToken()":{"details":"returns Infos of equity token, as struct is not returnable in current solidity version"},"granularity()":{"details":"smallest part of token not divisible"},"isOperatorFor(address,address)":{"return":"true if _operator is authorized for _tokenHolder"},"operatorSend(address,address,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"params":{"_operatorData":"Data generated by the operator to be sent to the recipient","_userData":"Data generated by the user to be sent to the recipient"}},"sendAdHocMessage(string)":{"details":"possibility to broadcast adHocMessages for any size"},"sendByTranche(uint256,address,uint256)":{"return":"returning a trancheId allows to further distinct equity-tranches into sub-tranches by token holder this enables token governance on company AND on token holder level (sub-tranches)"},"setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32)":{"details":"manage documents associated with token, using IPFS encrypted peer-to-peer filesharing"},"totalSupply()":{"details":"total amount of a token "},"tranchesOf(address)":{"details":"tranches of a tokenholder"},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"transfers token from A to B and fires event, additionally updates the TotalDistribution array (shareholder book)with _preventLocking parameter, should return _doSend(msg.sender, _to, _txamount, \"\", msg.sender, \"\", false) false here!"},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"transfers token from A to B and fires event, additionally updates the TotalDistribution array (shareholder book); transferFrom should be used for withdrawing workflow"},"uploadDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32)":{"details":"manage documents associated with investor"},"vote(uint256)":{"details":"give your vote for specific proposal"},"winningProposal()":{"details":"computes the winning proposal, gets proposal name from array and returns, fires event"}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"allowance(address,address)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory"},"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory"},"authorizeAdvocate(address)":{"notice":"authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory"},"authorizeOperator(address)":{"notice":"authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory"},"authorizeRequest(address)":{"notice":"advocate can approve investor to another level of accreditation; 0 = no investor, 1 = approved investor, 2 = advocate"},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory, ERC777 mandatory"},"balanceOfByTranche(address,uint256)":{"notice":"EIP1410 proposal"},"burn(address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"process to burn equity_burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, burn is a shell and important to fullfil onlyOwner requirementcompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410"},"burnByTranche(uint256,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, important to fullfil onlyOwner requirement"},"canSend(uint256,address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"EIP1400 proposal"},"clearRequest(bytes32)":{"notice":"advocate can clear a companies request, changing status pending into active token"},"decimals()":{"notice":"ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory to be 18"},"defaultOperators()":{"notice":"ERC777 mandatory"},"disableERC20()":{"notice":"disables the ERC20 interface. "},"enableERC20()":{"notice":"enables the ERC20 interface."},"getBalanceOfInEth(address)":{"notice":"convert balance of token in ETH or other currencies"},"getDefaultTranches(address)":{"notice":"gets the tranches of a token holder, in general the default tranche for a transaction is the latest issued tranche an owner posseses"},"getProposals()":{"notice":"for EVM could be possible to work with fixed array e.g. 3 proposals"},"granularity()":{"notice":"ERC777 mandatory"},"isControllable()":{"notice":"provides transparency wether defaultOperators can be adjusted by company: if government address is set company changed it and is thus not controllable (return false)"},"isOperatorFor(address,address)":{"notice":"check whether the _operator address is allowed to manage the tokens held by _tokenHolder address.ERC777 mandatory"},"mint(uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"process to mint new equitycompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410"},"name()":{"notice":"event quaterlyUpdate(uint _revenue, uint _revenueforecast);ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory"},"operatorBurn(address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"ERC777 mandatory"},"operatorBurnByTranche(uint256,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"EIP1400 mandatory"},"operatorSend(address,address,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"Send _amount of tokens on behalf of the address _from to the address _to.ERC777 mandatory"},"operatorSendByTranche(uint256,address,address,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"Send _amount of tokens on behalf of the address _from to the address _toEIP1410 mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777"},"payDividend(uint256)":{"notice":"starts with index 1 in array, as 0 is contract deployer = companyowner in most caseswould be also possible with PAYABLE to pay in ether and withdraw() to send ether, but with stocks more elegantuses default tranches to pay for dividend"},"revokeOperator(address)":{"notice":"revoke a third party _operator's rights to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens.ERC777 mandatory, EIP1400 & EIP1410 in discussionit may be that regulations require an issuer or a trusted third party to retain the power thus it can be that revoking an operator MUST NOT be allowed"},"send(address,uint256)":{"notice":"native ERC777 send function"},"sendByTranche(uint256,address,uint256)":{"notice":"native EIP1410 send function"},"setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32)":{"notice":"EIP1400 proposal"},"startBallot(bytes32[])":{"notice":"create a new ballot, only possible for owner of company"},"stopIssuance()":{"notice":"owner can stop issuance, not revertable!EIP1400 mandatory"},"symbol()":{"notice":"ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory"},"totalSupply()":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory, ERC777 mandatory"},"tranchesOf(address)":{"notice":"EIP1410 proposal"},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory"},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"ERC20 mandatory"}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/EquityTokenTransactionHelper.sol":"EquityTokenTransactionHelper"},"evmVersion":"byzantium","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/ConvertLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3925dbfc38bc2f1c7c388f8048b758ecbc0253f96ed68b30f4fed97bb7c17a7c","urls":["bzzr://0f5f138c7215a274b7c83da535d0488e8997dbc8ea10496d789892cf7b477a56"]},"project:/contracts/EquityToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x79d1694e9ef0e23dee420b69edeed2568d0947d224bbc296a4551737de93f52a","urls":["bzzr://208f1db575287699763bf963b3e1d0216e82b1e622479ea6708ac217713a9d74"]},"project:/contracts/EquityTokenFactory.sol":{"keccak256":"0x24743a403039d93c2b1b2fa7ee402a3b23c130d68c97ba762823a9e0d79b35eb","urls":["bzzr://9724840757b4675313cc4b44ae705217e48947cd188d7f043c524c83be33a648"]},"project:/contracts/EquityTokenTransaction.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8e77df7d2c8bd98d71e806d801968781bab7efa51e6bbb8f6766ea8a17d601fb","urls":["bzzr://6978cb67d3b4fe705f11fc3e1b2d36b127c1ba024830e1ec58693578bdebb096"]},"project:/contracts/EquityTokenTransactionHelper.sol":{"keccak256":"0xea9ef80302d9129926e2f7bf3e624d8873415b46af82575be6f9898f76e188bc","urls":["bzzr://312b9a6d3a00702c6d7ed3c76eab52c47b2ed45d1efdf62f7c58a7791b8da1aa"]},"project:/contracts/SafeMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x93c8b18c8a6178957d987bf27514619dedd974cb57707b1195c9021bbd2e5995","urls":["bzzr://8a49d2ff1d7ae2de602aaeb8f4ea893072c6d249d6c22cc7becadbdd8812cb28"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: sender can approve an amount to be withdrawn by spender

balanceOfByTranche(address,uint256).details: balance for any owner for specific tranche

canSend(uint256,address,address,uint256,.details: transfers of security might fail to multiple reasons (e.g. identity of sender and receiver, trading limits, meta state of token)relies on EIP1066 for Ethereum Standard Codes (ESC) and ERC770 for tranchingonly possible to read error code of 'doSend -> require' statement with assembly { call } for more elaborated error messages (see Ethereum documentation)
canSend(uint256,address,address,uint256,.return: ESC (byte), optional specific reason for failure (bytes32), (NOT IMPLEMENTED) destinantion tranche of the token beeing transfered (uint)

createToken(bytes32,bytes32,uint256).details: creates new token shell (status pending), safes information in storage

params._granularity: ensures, that granularity of shares is always a positive natural figure, cannot be changed ever

decimals().details: number of decimals token uses, divide token amount by number of decimals to get user representation

delegate(address).details: possibility to delegate your vote to another voter

getDefaultTranches(address).details: mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777 and ERC20

getInfosEquityToken().details: returns Infos of equity token, as struct is not returnable in current solidity version

granularity().details: smallest part of token not divisible

params._operatorData: Data generated by the operator to be sent to the recipient
params._userData: Data generated by the user to be sent to the recipient

sendAdHocMessage(string).details: possibility to broadcast adHocMessages for any size

sendByTranche(uint256,address,uint256).return: returning a trancheId allows to further distinct equity-tranches into sub-tranches by token holder this enables token governance on company AND on token holder level (sub-tranches)

setDocument(bytes32,string,bytes32).details: manage documents associated with token, using IPFS encrypted peer-to-peer filesharing

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfers token from A to B and fires event, additionally updates the TotalDistribution array (shareholder book)with _preventLocking parameter, should return _doSend(msg.sender, _to, _txamount, "", msg.sender, "", false) false here!

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: transfers token from A to B and fires event, additionally updates the TotalDistribution array (shareholder book); transferFrom should be used for withdrawing workflow

vote(uint256).details: give your vote for specific proposal

winningProposal().details: computes the winning proposal, gets proposal name from array and returns, fires event

authorizeAdvocate(address).notice: authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory

authorizeOperator(address).notice: authorize a third party _operator to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens. msg.sender always operator himself, thus requirementERC777 mandatory

authorizeRequest(address).notice: advocate can approve investor to another level of accreditation; 0 = no investor, 1 = approved investor, 2 = advocate

burn(address,uint256,bytes).notice: process to burn equity_burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, burn is a shell and important to fullfil onlyOwner requirementcompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410

burnByTranche(uint256,address,uint256,by.notice: burn function can be used by Company AND private token holder, important to fullfil onlyOwner requirement

clearRequest(bytes32).notice: advocate can clear a companies request, changing status pending into active token

decimals().notice: ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory to be 18

getBalanceOfInEth(address).notice: convert balance of token in ETH or other currencies

getDefaultTranches(address).notice: gets the tranches of a token holder, in general the default tranche for a transaction is the latest issued tranche an owner posseses

getProposals().notice: for EVM could be possible to work with fixed array e.g. 3 proposals

isControllable().notice: provides transparency wether defaultOperators can be adjusted by company: if government address is set company changed it and is thus not controllable (return false)

isOperatorFor(address,address).notice: check whether the _operator address is allowed to manage the tokens held by _tokenHolder address.ERC777 mandatory

mint(uint256,bytes,bytes).notice: process to mint new equitycompliant with ERC777 & EIP1410

name().notice: event quaterlyUpdate(uint _revenue, uint _revenueforecast);ERC20 optional, ERC777 mandatory

operatorSend(address,address,uint256,byt.notice: Send _amount of tokens on behalf of the address _from to the address _to.ERC777 mandatory

operatorSendByTranche(uint256,address,ad.notice: Send _amount of tokens on behalf of the address _from to the address _toEIP1410 mandatory for backward interoperability with ERC777

payDividend(uint256).notice: starts with index 1 in array, as 0 is contract deployer = companyowner in most caseswould be also possible with PAYABLE to pay in ether and withdraw() to send ether, but with stocks more elegantuses default tranches to pay for dividend

revokeOperator(address).notice: revoke a third party _operator's rights to manage (send) msg.sender's tokens.ERC777 mandatory, EIP1400 & EIP1410 in discussionit may be that regulations require an issuer or a trusted third party to retain the power thus it can be that revoking an operator MUST NOT be allowed

startBallot(bytes32[]).notice: create a new ballot, only possible for owner of company

stopIssuance().notice: owner can stop issuance, not revertable!EIP1400 mandatory
